DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of the topical therapies Protopic and Advantan as well as their combination against placebo in a Psoriasis Plaque Test
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Topical Antipsoriatics in the Psoriasis Plaque Test
DOC.detailed_description: daily psoriasis plaque tests for two weeks and optical coherence tomography (OCT) and 20-MHz-ultrasound on day 0 and day 11, 10 days post end of treatment and 20 days post end of treatment
DOC.criteria: Patients older than 18 Years Negative urine pregnancy test Written informed consent Good compliance Patients less than 18 years Pregnant patients Patients with renal insufficiency, liver diseases Patients who received systemic antipsoriatic treatment or UV treatment less than 4 weeks prior to study Patients who used topical antipsoriatics within two weeks prior to study Immunosuppressed Patients
